template.name: tv
template.value: <TextView android:id="@+id/textview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="14dp" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="@color/"/>

template.name: _listview
template.value: <ListView android:id="@+id/_listview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/bg_reg" android:cacheColorHint="@android:color/transparent" android:divider="#d7d7d7" android:dividerHeight="1px" android:listSelector="@android:color/transparent" android:scrollbars="none"/>

template.name: flbtn
template.value: <android.support.design.widget.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/fab" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_gravity="bottom|end" android:layout_margin="@dimen/fab_margin" app:backgroundTint="#ff87ffeb" app:rippleColor="#33728dff" app:elevation="1px" app:pressedTranslationZ="1px" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_dialog_email"/>

template.name: _textarrow
template.value: <CustomImageTextArrow android:id="@+id/arrow_" android:layout_marginTop="100dp" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="90dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:maintextcolor="#ff0000" app:maintext="TTest" app:maintextsize="20sp" app:maintextmargleft="50dp" app:othertextcolor="#ff9000" app:othertext="other" app:othertextsize="16sp" app:othertextmargright="50dp" app:leftimgwidth="10dp" app:leftimgheight="10dp" app:leftimagemargleft="10dp" app:leftimgsrc="@mipmap/ic_launcher" app:rightimgshow="true" app:bottom_line_color="#0000ff" app:bottom_line_margleft="30dp" app:bottom_line_height="1px" >

template.name: _texttop
template.value: <CustomImageTextTop android:id="@+id/arrow_" android:layout_marginTop="400dp" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="48dp" app:top_textcolor="#ff0000" app:top_text="TTest" app:top_textsize="10sp" app:top_imgwidth="22dp" app:top_imgheight="22dp" app:top_imagemargtop="1dp" app:top_imgsrc="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" />
